title: Cardiac Atlas Data — cardiac_atlas
text: series shapefile data represent cardiac anatomy 2D.

title: Cardiac Atlas Data — cardiac_atlas
text: named list different cardiac views, underlying shapefiles. shapes combination line polygon geometries. types following: extent = map background shapes built upon chambers = individual anatomical chambers within heart conduction = elements conduction system projections = involutions foldings compose critical tissue within chamber cavities septum = dividing structures chambers valves = cardiac valves (tricuspid, mitral/bicuspid, aortic, pulmonic) vessels = venous arterial structures current projections available cardiac_atlas object : right_atrium_rao = right anterior oblique view focused right atrium

title: Cardiac Atlas Data — cardiac_atlas
text: Created author using QGIS software templates created "Atlas Cardiac Anatomy" Mori Shivkumar (2022).
